ValidationRule.description: Loss Reason Explanation is required when Stage is changed from ANY stage to Discontinued
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Individual_Giving', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Organisation_Giving'), ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Discontinued"), ISBLANK(Loss_Reason_Explanation__c) )
